definition: to love dearly/to feel sorry for sb/to regret/to grudge/to be distressed

sentences.english: Jiang Chunyang and Liu Lan witnessed their son's changes and felt heartbroken.
sentences.chinese: 姜春阳和刘兰都看到了儿子的变化，很心疼。

sentences.english: The child is gone, Sun Qian is very distressed, she did not know how to say to Li Qiong.
sentences.chinese: 孩子没了，孙茜很是心疼，她不知道怎么和李琼说。

sentences.english: Xiao Suqin see xiao LAN hand injury, is love dearly.
sentences.chinese: 萧素琴看到萧岚手掌的伤，很是心疼。

sentences.english: Mother distressed me, let me step down in deep-water dirty, foul.
sentences.chinese: 妈妈心疼我，不让我下来踩到又脏又臭的深水里。

sentences.english: Today helped me to buy crisply , 45 US dollars, love dearly really the human.
sentences.chinese: 今天爽帮我买了，45美元，真叫人心疼。

sentences.english: If you see the first signs of life, and why should bear the tea cool love.
sentences.chinese: 人生之若如初见，又何必承受人走茶凉的心疼。

sentences.english: See suicide after poor Du Shan, xiao-feng liu love of tears.
sentences.chinese: 看到自杀后可怜的杜山，刘小凤心疼的泪如雨下。

sentences.english: Sometimes it’s painful to look at the data.
sentences.chinese: 有时候看着数据，你会觉得心疼。

sentences.english: A love that I burst into tears.
sentences.chinese: 一句心疼说得我泪流满面。

sentences.english: Zhaozhuren really is not taken public money and heartache.
sentences.chinese: 赵主任果然是拿了公家的钱不心疼。

sentences.english: Lovely white fox, so you let me love is love.
sentences.chinese: 可爱的白狐，这样的你让我喜欢有心疼。

sentences.english: He loves his wife very much and never lets her do heavy work.
sentences.chinese: 他很心疼他的妻子，从不让她干重活。

sentences.english: This sense of lack that many of us experience breaks my heart.
sentences.chinese: 这种很多人都体验的缺失感总让我心疼。

sentences.english: Skippy was very sorry for him and went out for something suitable for a meal.
sentences.chinese: 跳跳心疼弟弟，于是，他出门找吃的去了。

sentences.english: Just four years ago, I figure no one miss a heart beat if Harnish left town.
sentences.chinese: 只是四年前我觉得就算我离开，也没人会心疼。

sentences.english: Love is to buy the wrong shoes, wearing a sore foot, threw distressed.
sentences.chinese: 错爱是买了不合脚的鞋子，穿着脚疼，扔了心疼。

definition: to feel distressed about sth/heartache/cardiac pain
to feel sad/to feel unwell/(of life) to be difficult
to grieve/to be broken-hearted/to feel deeply hurt
to feel wronged/to cause sb to feel wronged/grievance
to feel unwell/to suffer pain/to be difficult to bear
to feel guilty/to feel ashamed of oneself/to be remorseful
to take pity on/to feel tenderness toward
to regret/to feel that it is a great pity/to feel sorry for sb
